text: New America is a novel by Poul Anderson published in 1982. ==Plot summary== New America is a collection of short stories, including "The Queen of Air and Darkness". ==Reception== Michael J. Lowrey reviewed New America in Ares Magazine Special Edition #2 and commented that "Taken in toto, this is a very good collection which deserves repackaging in a more straightforward manner." ==Reviews== *Review by Mary Ann McIntyre Nixon (1983) in Fantasy Newsletter, #57 March 1983 ==References== Category:1982 novels
title: New America (novel)
